channel.title: Project Mining
channel.description:
I'm going to attempt make mining that's close to RS. (Need to update vid, can't do atm)
Current Vid: [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=30xkhlv&s=4]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=30xkhlv&s=4[/url]
What I've Done:
- Started making a mining handler. - Says, "You swing your pick at the rock" only once, unless you click again. - Loops mining. - Tells you when you get an ore. - All rocks give you their ore. - Ores given calculated by mining level, pick axe, and rock. (Was a pain in the ass! Took me 2 hours) - Started code for replacing mined rocks with grey rocks, then returning to original rock. - When you mine a rocks ore, you stop mining and the rock is replaced with a grey rock.
Need to work on:
- Working on replacing mined ore. Need to add timer to make the grey rock turn back into a regular rock. - Giving mining exp.. Easy, but I'll save this until the end. - Levels required for pick axes... easy, something I'll do at end - Levels required for rocks... easy... something I'll do at end - Golem random event and smoking rock random event.
I may have forgotten something.. If there is another factor in RS mining please remind me.
I can't post a new vid atm, post tommorow.

Private servers are better than rs.
[/quote]Tbh how you figure rs has over 130M accs made and millions of dollars behind it i dont see any private server like that

Tbh you typed “How” when it WAS suppose to be “have”, You forgot a “D” on “Figured”, You used slang for “Runescape”, You use a “M” for “Million”, You used slang once again for “Accounts”, You forgot a period after “it”, You didn’t capitalize “I” you forgot a " ’ " in “Don’t”, You didn’t put a period after “that.”

Hmmm, How you got 200 Rep…
I have no clue.[/quote]
Rofl, you were wrong on almost all of that.

item.title: Project Mining
item.dc:creator: @Randomking17 Randomking17
item.description:
@Randomking17 wrote:

Gl mate.
Also, If you want to make a “Project Woodcutting”…
Use this.

if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction >= 1600) && (IsCutting == true)) { lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(woodcutting[2], playerWoodcutting); if (freeSlots() > 0) { sM("You chop down some logs."); addItem(woodcutting[4], 1); attackTimer += 2; } else { playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = OriginalWeapon; OriginalWeapon = -1; resetAnimation(); IsCutting = false; resetWC(); } } } else { // createEnemyItem(woodcutting[4]); sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); woodcutting[0] = -1; resetWC(); return false; } } else { sM("You need " + woodcutting[1] + " " + statName[playerWoodcutting] + " to cut those logs."); resetWC(); return false; } } else { sM("You must be wielding an axe to Woodcutt!"); resetWC(); return false; } return true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Project Mining
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I’m going to attempt make mining that’s close to RS. (Need to update vid, can’t do atm)

Current Vid: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=30xkhlv&s=4

What I’ve Done:

  • Started making a mining handler.
  • Says, “You swing your pick at the rock” only once, unless you click again.
  • Loops mining.
  • Tells you when you get an ore.
  • All rocks give you their ore.
  • Ores given calculated by mining level, pick axe, and rock. (Was a pain in the ass! Took me 2 hours)
  • Started code for replacing mined rocks with grey rocks, then returning to original rock.
  • When you mine a rocks ore, you stop mining and the rock is replaced with a grey rock.

Need to work on:

  • Working on replacing mined ore. Need to add timer to make the grey rock turn back into a regular rock.
  • Giving mining exp… Easy, but I’ll save this until the end.
  • Levels required for pick axes… easy, something I’ll do at end
  • Levels required for rocks… easy… something I’ll do at end
  • Golem random event and smoking rock random event.

I may have forgotten something… If there is another factor in RS mining please remind me.

I can’t post a new vid atm, post tommorow.
